author: orion3336
content:
Hey folks, i had the chance to talk about proof orchestration at ethproofs DevConnect.

I wanted to connect here and share the preprint of the rust proof orchestrator: https://arxiv.org/abs/2602.16338

The orchestration achieves a median of 5ms overhead and exhibits perfect linear scaling.

The tool is open sourced.
https://github.com/zircuit-labs/push0-orchestrator/

Would love to explore if there's any overlap with what you're building!
